mapper.select: SELECT column_name colNm FROM user_tab_columns WHERE table_name = UPPER(#{tableName})

SELECT cols.column_name AS col_id, cols.data_type, cols.DATA_LENGTH AS col_length, cols.NULLABLE AS col_isnullable_text, CASE WHEN cons.constraint_type = 'P' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS col_ispk_text FROM all_tab_columns cols LEFT JOIN all_cons_columns cons_col ON cols.table_name = cons_col.table_name AND cols.column_name = cons_col.column_name LEFT JOIN ALL_CONSTRAINTS cons ON cons_col.constraint_name = cons.constraint_name AND cons.constraint_type = 'P' WHERE cols.table_name = UPPER(#{tableName})
